All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddFacilityActivity
Allows user to add/edit their facility User can input/edit name and phone number of their facility The facility location is the location of the user when they are creating the facility
AdminSearchActivity
Allows admin to browse facilities, events, or profiles in the database Admin can enter query to search for specific facilities, events, or profiles
CancelEntrantDialogFragment
A dialog fragment that allows an organizer to confirm the cancellation of an entrant from an event.
CreateEventActivity
Activity for creating a new event.
DatabaseManager
This class manages interactions with a Firebase Firestore database and Firebase Storage.
DatabaseManager.CancelEntrantCallback
Callback interface for entrant cancellation for an event.
DatabaseManager.changeEventPosterCallback
Callback for changing the poster of an event
DatabaseManager.DeleteProfilePictureCallback
Callback interface for deleting a profile picture.
DatabaseManager.EventCreationCallback
Callback interface for handling the result of an event creation operation.
DatabaseManager.EventRemovalCallback
Callback interface for event deletion
DatabaseManager.eventRetrievalCallback
Callback interface for event retrieval
DatabaseManager.EventsSearchCallback
Callback interface for events search
DatabaseManager.FacilityCreationCallback
Callback interface for adding facility
DatabaseManager.FacilityRemovalCallback
Callback interface for facility deletion
DatabaseManager.facilityRetrievalCallback
Callback interface for facility retrieval
DatabaseManager.FacilitySearchCallback
Callback interface for facility search
DatabaseManager.getJoinedEventsCallback
Callback interface for joined Events retrieval
DatabaseManager.getNotificationsCallback
Callback interface for getNotification
DatabaseManager.getUserLocationsCallback
Callback interface for retrieving user locations stored in an event
DatabaseManager.IsAdminCallback
Callback interface for admin check
DatabaseManager.joinWaitingListCallback
Callback interface for joinEventWaitingList
DatabaseManager.NotificationCreationCallback
Callback interface for createNotification
DatabaseManager.ProfileRemovalCallback
Callback interface for user deletion
DatabaseManager.ProfilesSearchCallback
Callback interface for profiles search
DatabaseManager.QRRemovalCallback
Callback interface for QR deletion
DatabaseManager.retrieveEntrantListCallback
Callback interface for created Entrants retrieval
DatabaseManager.retrieveEventListCallback
Callback interface for created Events retrieval
DatabaseManager.UploadProfilePictureCallback
Callback interface for uploading a profile picture.
DatabaseManager.UserCreationCallback
Callback interface for handling the result of a user creation operation.
DatabaseManager.UserRetrievalCallback
Callback interface for user retrieval operations.
Entrant
The Entrant class represents a user participating in events.
EntrantExListAdapter
Adapter for Entrant objects in expandable lists Displays the details of entrants
Event
Represents an Event that entrants can join, or organizers can create Stores Event data and provides methods for retrieving and setting this data
EventExListAdapter
Adapter for Event objects in expandable lists Displays the details of Event, and differentiates joined, pending, and created events
EventListener
Listens for changes in a given event in the database Notifies listeners for changes
EventListener.EventUpdateCallback
Interface for callback to handle update
EventsAdapter
Adapter for events in list Used when admin is searching for events
EventsSearchActivity
Displays results of events whose name matches the administrator's query Allows administrator to click on event in list in order to view details and remove it
ExListAdapter<C>
Adapter for expandable lists Implements all functionalities of expandable lists except the getChildView()
Facility
Represents organizer's facility Stores facility name, location, and phone number
FacilityAdapter
Adapter for facilities in list Used when admin searches for facilities
FacilitySearchActivity
Displays results of facilities whose name matches the administrator's query Allows administrator to click on facility in list in order to view all details and remove it
InitialLoginActivity
InitialLoginActivity is the activity that handles the initial login process for users.
InputValidator
A utility class for validating common types of input data.
LocationManager
This class manages location services, including checking for location permissions, requesting them if necessary, and retrieving the device's last known location.
LocationManager.OnLocationReceivedListener
Interface to handle location callbacks.
MainActivity
MainActivity handles the app's main UI setup, user data initialization, and navigation to various activities.
ManageFacilityActivity
Displays user's facility information if they have one Gives Entrants the option to add a facility to their profile Gives Organizers the option to remove or edit their facility
ManageProfileActivity
ManageProfileActivity provides a simple, user-friendly interface for editing profile details.
Notification
Represents a system notification to be displayed on the user's device.
NotificationListener
Listens for notification changes in FireStore and triggers system notifications on the user's device.
NotificationsHelper
A helper class for sending notifications to users.
Organizer
Represents a user who adds a facility to their profile Adds facility and createdEvents attributes to the already created Entrant class attributes
ProfilePictureHelper
A utility class for managing profile pictures, including generating default profile pictures, saving and retrieving Bitmaps, and uploading them to Firebase Storage.
ProfilesAdapter
Adapter for profiles in list Used when admin searches for profiles
ProfilesSearchActivity
Activity for searching and managing profiles.
qrCodeActivity
Activity for generating and displaying a QR code based on an event's poster ID.
RemoveEventsActivity
Activity to handle the removal of events from the database.
RemoveFacilityActivity
Displays all information of facility that was clicked by administrator in FacilitySearchActivity Allows administrator to remove facility
RemoveProfileActivity
Activity for removing a user profile, including associated data such as profile pictures and facilities.
ScanQRCode
Activity to use Camera and scan a QR code
ScanWithCam
Used by ScanQRCode Activity Needed to extend CaptureActivity
SendOrganizerNotificationFragment
Fragment that allows the organizer to send a notification to selected recipient groups.
TextDrawable
Utility class for creating text-based Drawables with random background colors.
UserLocation
Represents a user's location with latitude and longitude coordinates.
UserManager
Singleton class to manage user data and interactions with user updates
UserManager.UserUpdateListener
Listener interface for receiving user update notifications.
ViewCreatedEvent
Displays the details of a created event to the user.
ViewEnteredEvent
Allows the user to view the details of an event they have joined.
ViewEventEntrantData
Allows Organizer to view entrants in the waiting list, cancelled entrants, entrants who won the lottery, and entrants who have accepted an invitation.
ViewEventPosterActivity
Fetches and displays an event poster for an Organizer.
ViewMapActivity
The ViewMapActivity is responsible for displaying a map of event participants' locations and the event's facility.
ViewQRCodeActivity
Displays the QR code for a created event
ViewScannedEvent
Handles the viewing of event details when QR code is scanned
